{"id":1069051746,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1696650519,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1069051746/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to English Words","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n\npublic:\n        string ones[20] = {\"\", \" One\", \" Two\", \" Three\", \" Four\", \" Five\", \" Six\", \" Seven\", \" Eight\", \" Nine\", \" Ten\", \" Eleven\", \" Twelve\", \" Thirteen\", \" Fouteen\", \" Fiftenn\", \" Sixteen\", \"Seventeen\", \" Eighteen\", \" Nineteen\"};\n        string tens[10] = {\"\", \" Ten\", \" Twenty\", \" Thirty\", \" Forty\", \" Fifty\", \" Sixty\", \" Seventy\", \" Eighty\", \" Ninety\"};\n        string thousands[4] ={\"\", \" Thousand\", \" Million\", \" Billion\"};\n        string helper(int n){\n            if(n < 20){\n                return ones[n];\n            } \n            if(n < 100){\n                return tens[n / 10] + helper(n % 10);\n            } \n            if(n < 1000){\n                return helper(n / 100) + \" Hundred\" + helper(n % 100);\n            }\n            for(int i=3;i>=0;i--){\n                if(n >= pow(1000, i)){\n                    return helper(n / pow(1000, i)) + thousands[i] + helper(n % (int)pow(1000, i));\n                }\n            }\n            return \"\";\n        }\n    string numberToWords(int num) {\n        if(num == 0){\n            return \"Zero\";\n        }\n        return helper(num).substr(1);\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-english-words","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
